scripts.test: prettier --check . && npm run test:client && npm run test:server
scripts.dev: npm run dev:docker && concurrently npm:dev:client npm:dev:server
scripts.dev:docker: docker compose create && docker compose start
scripts.postgis:create:norway: echo create database norway_data | docker exec -i postgis /usr/bin/psql --user postgres postgres
scripts.postgis:create:norway:postgis: echo create extension postgis | docker exec -i postgis /usr/bin/psql --user postgres norway_data
scripts.postgis:load: npm run postgis:load:kommuner && npm run postgis:load:grunnkretser && npm run postgis:load:eiendom:oslo
scripts.postgis:import: docker exec -i postgis /usr/bin/psql --user postgres norway_data < database/import-norway-data.sql
scripts.postgis:create: npm run postgis:create:norway && npm run postgis:create:norway:postgis && npm run postgis:load && npm run postgis:import
